entry.title: $2300 // No fee Manhattan UES one bedroom apartment in elevator building
entry.content:
1BR / 1Ba available now
laundry in bldg
street parking
- No fee!
- Seeking someone to take over my 12 month lease ending April 30, 2019
- Move-in date March 15, but flexible after March 11
- Application and approval by landlord required, but usually easy and fast
- Upon approval, pay $2300 security deposit to me and landlord will refund you my $2300 deposit at end of April
- One bedroom one bath. Spacious living room hosting a full sized bed in addition to dining set and sofa, and the bedroom fits another full sized bed.
- Elevator, laundry in the building
- Conveniently located between 2nd and 3rd on 81st in the upper east side, on the 2nd floor. Walking to Central Park and all 5th Ave museums. 2 blocks away from Q train station and 7 minutes walk to 4, 5, or 6 train stations on 77th and 86th
- Plenty of bars and restaurants within steps
- Call/text me at show contact info to view the place anytime
